StructuralInheritance.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    StructuralInheritance.@protostruct — Macro.

    @protostruct(struct_ [, prefix_])

    creates a struct that can have structure inherited from it if also defined by @protostruct, creates an abstract type with a name given by the struct definitions name and a prefix. The concrete type inherits from the abstract type and anything which inherits the concrrete types structure also inherits from the abstract type.

    StructuralInheritance.StructuralInheritance
    StructuralInheritance.abstracttype — Function.

    Creates an abstract type with the given name

    StructuralInheritance.addparams — Function.

    attaches parameters to a name

    StructuralInheritance.assertcollisionfree — Function.

    throws an error is the fields contain overlapping symbols

    StructuralInheritance.deparametrize_lightName — Function.

    strips parameterization off of a name that does not include inheritence information
